description.full: Play as the stars of International Cricket. Featuring officially licensed ICC Cricket World Cup 2007 and ICC Champions Trophy 2006 tournaments. With Xbox Live play, new Coaching Mode, new AI system and new Batting, Bowling and Fielding features.
description.short: Play as the stars of International Cricket. Featuring officially licensed ICC Cricket World Cup 2007 and ICC Champions Trophy 2006 tournaments. With Xbox Live play, new Coaching Mode, new AI system and new Batting, Bowling and Fielding features.
